COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix `podman machine set --rootful` for applehv Fixes a bug where a user would be unable to change a rootless machine to rootful. Also makes sure that the podman/docker socket service is updated if the UID or Rootful status of the host user has been updated. [NO NEW TESTS NEEDED] Fixes: #21195 Signed-off-by: Jake Correnti <jakecorrenti+github@proton.me>

Fix `podman machine set --rootful` for applehv Fixes a bug where a user would be unable to change a rootless machine to rootful. Also makes sure that the podman/docker socket service is updated if the UID or Rootful status of the host user has been updated. [NO NEW TESTS NEEDED] Fixes: #21195 Signed-off-by: Jake Correnti <jakecorrenti+github@proton.me>
